name: PHP WkHtmlToPdf
tagline: A slim PHP wrapper around wkhtmltopdf with an easy to use and clean OOP interface
body:
PHP WkHtmlToPdf provides a simple and clean interface to ease PDF creation with [wkhtmltopdf](http://code.google.com/p/wkhtmltopdf/).

This project was sponsored by [PeoplePerHour](http://www.peopleperhour.com).

## Documentation moved

All the documentation has moved to the [github page](https://github.com/mikehaertl/phpwkhtmltopdf) now.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
